title: Myanmar protesters defy crackdown as U.N. envoy warns of 'imminent bloodbath'
content:
1. Myanmar protesters defy crackdown as U.N. envoy warns of 'imminent bloodbath'  Reuters
  2. UN envoy warns of possible civil war in Myanmar as violence mounts  Arirang News
  3. UN envoy: Myanmar faces possibility of major civil war  Yahoo News
  4. UNSC envoy warns of 'civil war, bloodbath' in Myanmar | Violence | Military Junta | Myanmar Protest  WION
  5. Aung San Suu Kyi ‘in Good Health,’ Says Lawyer After First Meeting Since Coup  Radio Free Asia
